name: Go

name: Visual Studio Code
isNew: Visual Studio Code is a code editor redefined and optimized for building and debugging modern web and cloud applications.

name: AWS DevOps
isNew: AWS DevOps provides services to simplify provisioning and managing infrastructure, deploying application code, automating software release processes, and monitoring your application and infrastructure performance.

name: Microservices
isNew: Microservices arranges an application as a collection of loosely coupled services.
